PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-10902012-09-20,  ,  ,  HC,  EC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING A TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA), in order to enable the Ministers to develop risk management instruments under CEPA 1999 to manage human health and environmental risks posed by HYDRAZINE substance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0189 Publication Date: 2012-10-10
AttachmentsAttachment
